name: github-issues
description: GitHub Issues Management - Elite agent for managing GitHub Issues using the gh CLI with priority workflow, guided commands, and best practices
author: Tobey Forsman

agents.name: github-issues-manager
agents.description: Elite GitHub Issues management specialist using gh CLI for all issue operations

commands.name: gh-create-issue
commands.description: Create new GitHub issue with guided workflow and priority assessment

commands.name: gh-close-issue
commands.description: Close GitHub issue with verification and proper documentation

commands.name: gh-triage
commands.description: Triage open issues and ensure all have proper priority labels

commands.name: gh-status-report
commands.description: Generate comprehensive status report of all GitHub issues
